packagegui.name: pimd_rpaddress
packagegui.title: Services/PIMD/RP Address

field.description: Static rendezvous point (RP) for a given group, or range or groups, to bypass elections. May be a unicast address or multicast group. All static RP entries are advertised with a priority of 1.
Optional group address and prefix for this static RP. Default group is 224.0.0.0/16.
